dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: THE CHURCH IS A CLOSED CONTAINER / JESUS IS AN INTRUDER

kernfrasen: turning the world right side up
the church has never gone anywhere

cognitieve_implicaties: Human agency is passive compared to divine action
onbedoelde_consequenties: God as a violator of boundaries
Potential lack of respect for human consent

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: Re-activates the source domain of physical security to describe spiritual stagnation.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon moves logically from a static container (the locked room) to a dynamic path (the mission). The 'Gate-Crasher' metaphor serves as the catalyst for this transition.

incoherentie_punten.metafoor_b: Peace as a word of assault
incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: Peace is traditionally a state of rest, but here it is described as an aggressive force.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The intrusion of the gate-crasher is the birth-pang of the new life.

sterktes.beschrijving: Takes the 'dead' greeting of 'Peace' and revitalizes it as a 'lordly word' that 'claims space'.
sterktes.voorbeeld: If Jesus had been a Southerner, he would have said, 'Hey.' But he didnâ€™t. He said, 'Peace.'

risicos.beschrijving: Using 'assault' and 'gate-crasher' to describe Jesus can project a coercive image of God.
risicos.voorbeeld: It is also, however, a word of assault.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may view God as overbearing or ignoring human boundaries.

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High; connects the 'wind' of the Spirit to current events.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Jesus 'dominates the room' and 'takes over the meeting'.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Labeling the church's safety as 'ludicrous' and 'cowering'.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strongly aligns with Pentecost (Spirit as wind/power).

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the ARCHITECTURAL and JOURNEY domains. It effectively uses the tension between 'Closed Doors' and 'Sent People' to drive the narrative. The preacher successfully avoids 'dead' religious language by using provocative terms like 'gate-crasher' and 'assault'.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Connect the wind to specific physical sensations of disruption or power.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The wind that rattles the windows of our complacency.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Clarify that the 'assault' is against the 'enemies of peace' (anxiety/greed) rather than the person.

entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Balance with the image of the disciples' 'joy' upon seeing him to show the entry is welcomed even if unexpected.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To soften the 'gate-crasher' image with the organic necessity of new life breaking through a shell.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to disrupt comfortable religious schemas and mobilize a congregation.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Instead of just praising the 'gate-crasher' imagery as clever, CMT reveals how it re-maps the church's relationship to its own boundaries.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Moves beyond 'experience' to the cognitive structures that make the experience of 'peace' possible.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Identifies that the preacher uses 'Verticality' (lordly word) to establish authority before using 'Path' (sending) to demand action.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: Turning the world right side up
appendices.notities: The preacher uses 'magisterial' and 'lordly' frequently to reinforce the Verticality schema of Christ's authority.
